text: Vimodrone is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Milan in the Lombardy region in Italy. It is near the cities Milan and Cernusco sul Naviglio. == Twin towns == Vimodrone is twinned with: * Bella, Italy, since 2012 * Cittanova, Italy, since 2017 == References == Category:Comunes in the Metropolitan City of Milan
title: Vimodrone
